title: Behavior of function from graph of derivative

content.question: The graph of f’, the derivative of the function f, is shown above. Which of the following statements is true about f?

choices.label: f has a local minimum at x = 0.
f is not differentiable at x = -1 and x = 1.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
